name: Slime Kingdom (itch)
description:
How to play:

Movements:
W - Move up
A - Move left
S - Move down
D - Move right

The movement is a bit different. Your player will be able to move in any direction for 1 second and after that, it will stop for 1 second also. (Kinda like a hopping movement and fits for slime movements)

Establish your kingdom by gathering blue friendly slimes to increase your strength and defeating all red enemy slimes.

Small blue slime - gives you 1 strength to defeat a small red enemy slime.

Normal blue slime - if you have 1 strength, it can give you 1 more  strength to defeat small and normal red enemy slimes. You will be having 2 strengths for that.

Large blue slime - if you have 2 strengths, it can give you overpowered strength, making you formidable to all red enemy slimes.

That's all and enjoy my game! (hopefully)
